sentences.text: This MLB game was an absolute slugfest, with both teams hitting multiple home runs!
The Cincinnati Reds hammered the Pirates in a decisive 8-0 win on Sunday.
The match took place at the Great American Ball Park in Cincinnati.
That was a real nail-biter, I'm sure the Reds would have hated winning if it were any easier.
Pirates fans are looking forward to the postseason opportunities next year.
